name: Meet Me Outside
description: Inside the italian Cantom Asylum Hospital, lives Arlo Faranzza. When having hallucinations of his death mother calling him out of the asylum, he starts his journey to find the exit and meet yourself with Grazie Faranzza. When killing the diabolic enemies, arlo doesn't know that, in reality, they were all fruits of his hallucinations. Innocent lives have been taken on this infinite route through the asylum – the one true enemy.
